activities: Generally, clients who use Sparta Systems products collect, process, and store personal data (if any) on their own premises; however, those clients who take advantage of our Software-as-a-Service offering may collect the personal data of E.U. residents and store that information on our servers located in the U.S.  In addition, Sparta Systems stores the personal data of its E.U. employees on its U.S. servers.  Sparta Systems may also collect personal data of consumers, some of which may be from the E.U. on our websites directly.  The personal data of E.U. consumers will also be stored on our servers located in the U.S.
